A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Though the \"free the horses\" scene was boring and unnecessary\, the rest of the film was quite enjoyable. Being an avid reader of the Star Wars \"Legends\" I was thinking I would be disappointed\, but I actually felt that this iteration was entertaining\, reminiscent of the Empire Strikes Back\, and though not as good as the books\, the film was so thrilling it is hard to see why it received so much backlash.
